privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Learn how ZhiNao Era collects, uses, and protects your personal information

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Shenzhen ZhiNao Era Technology Co., Ltd. ("we", "us", or "our") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:

usage.title: Use of Information
usage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

items.service: Providing and improving our GEO services
items.communicate: Communicating with you about service matters

protection.title: Information Protection
protection.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including data encryption, access controls, and security audits. We regularly review our security practices to ensure your information remains safe.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information when: you give explicit consent, required by law, or working with service providers (who are bound by confidentiality agreements).

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: Access and obtain a copy of your personal information
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal information
items.withdraw: Withdraw consent (without affecting prior lawful processing)

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.metaDescription: Terms and conditions for using ZhiNao Era GEO services

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the services provided by Shenzhen ZhiNao Era Technology Co., Ltd. ("we", "us", or "our"), you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: We provide AI Search Ecosystem Optimization (GEO) related services, including but not limited to: brand AI ecosystem diagnosis, strategic planning, content optimization, multi-platform answer optimization, sentiment monitoring, etc. The specific content of services is subject to the signed service agreement.

account.title: Account Responsibility
account.content: Using our services requires creating an account. You must:

items.accurate: Provide accurate and complete registration information
items.security: Safeguard your account credentials and be responsible for account activities
items.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use

usage.title: Usage Guidelines
usage.content: When using our services, you agree to:

items.noHarm: Not engage in any activities that may harm the service or other users
items.noInfringe: Not infringe on intellectual property or other rights of others
items.noMisuse: Not abuse or attempt unauthorized access to systems

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content, trademarks, software, and technology in the service are the property of us or our licensors. Without written permission, you may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Paid services are executed according to agreed prices and payment methods. Credits are non-refundable after purchase. We reserve the right to adjust prices with prior notice.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from use of the services. Our total liability shall not exceed the service fees you have paid.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violations of terms or other reasons. Upon termination, your access to the services will cease immediately.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms. Significant changes will be notified through website announcements or email. Continued use of services indicates acceptance of updated terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
